title: riot pls
body: So am i going to be refunded for the time and lp i have lost because once again you have fucked up a patch. Twice now i have been kicked from a lobby with atleast 20 seconds left and the reason being failing to select a champion... fix this shit so i can play this rubbish game

replies.body: Yep, been happening since this morning, Servers don't respond at random times during Champ Select, then shows up with Unknown Error. Sorry about that...
